articles.description: Likely to be offered at an introductory starting price of under Rs 5.5 lakh.
articles.content:
- To be offered in two petrol engine options 
- Likely to be offered at an introductory starting price of under Rs 5.5 lakh
Post much wait, prices for the Renault Kiger sub-four metre SUV will be a… [+1520 chars]
